#summary how to get orika binaries

= Downloads =
== Releases ==
_Available from *Maven central*_
{{{
<dependency>
   <groupId>ma.glasnost.orika</groupId>
   <artifactId>orika-core</artifactId>
   <version>1.2.1</version><!-- or latest version -->
</dependency> 
}}}

----
== Snapshots ==
Include our Cloudbees snapshot repository
{{{
<repositories>
   ...
   <repository>
      <id>orika-snapshots</id>
      <name>Orika Snapshots hosted by Cloudbees</name>
      <url>https://repository-orika.forge.cloudbees.com/snapshot</url>
   </repository>
   ...	
</repositories>

<dependencies>
   ...
   <dependency>
      <groupId>ma.glasnost.orika</groupId>
      <artifactId>orika-core</artifactId>
      <version>1.2.2-SNAPSHOT</version><!-- or latest version -->
   </dependency> 
   ...
</dependencies>
}}} 
----
== Not using Maven dependency management? ==
Download the jars from one of the links below:
|| [http://search.maven.org/#search|ga|1|orika Releases] || [https://repository-orika.forge.cloudbees.com/snapshot/ Snapshots] ||
